author: UniMiBAnalyses
body:
This PR adds the codes for the amplitude local reconstruction for ECAL for Phase 2. Details about the implemented weights method to reconstruct the amplitude have been presented in the ECAL DPG meeting [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/991268/). 
The PR was prepared with the help of @amassiro and @thomreis.
title: Adding the codes for ECAL Phase2 amplitude local reconstruction
